To the right is a visualization of all the computing courese in California. These courses are identified based on their content.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### CA Computing Courses

```{r}
donuts <- read_csv("dunkindonuts.csv")

m <- leaflet(donuts) %>%
  addProviderTiles("CartoDB.Positron") %>%
  setView(lng = -119.016768, lat = 36.065230, zoom = 7) %>%
  addCircles(~lng, ~lat, popup = donuts$city, weight = 3, radius=40,
             color="#ffa500", stroke = TRUE, fillOpacity = 0.8) %>%
  addLegend("bottomright", colors = "#ffa500", 
            labels= "Intro to Computer Science",
            title="CA Computing Courses")
m
```

### Data Explorer

```{r}
courses <- read.csv("13_14CACompCourses.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
datatable(
  courses, extensions = 'Buttons', options = list(
    dom = 'Bfrtip',
    buttons = c('copy', 'csv', 'excel', 'pdf', 'print')
  ))
```
